data.head: Form Radio zoro
data.title:
A selection of zoro forms created using HTML and CSS.
Choose from Straw Hat zoro, Gear Fourth zoro, Boundman zoro, Snakeman zoro, Tankman zoro.
Each form represents a unique aspect of zoro's character and abilities.
The radio buttons allow users to make a single selection, indicating their preferred zoro form.
The design is visually appealing and responsive, ensuring a smooth user experience.

markers.name: Wado Ichimonji
markers.info:
Wado Ichimonji: It's Zoro's first sword and a special gift from his childhood friend.
It holds great significance to Zoro as it represents his determination to protect and fulfill his dreams.

markers.name: Enma
markers.info:
Enma: Zoro's fifth sword. It once belonged to Kozuki Oden and is one of his two swords.
This sword possesses tremendous power and requires careful control.

markers.name: Sandai Kitetsu
markers.info:
Sandai Kitetsu: One of the Three Great Kitetsu (Supreme-Grade Kitetsu) swords and Zoro's second sword in his collection.
It's believed to be cursed and is an extremely dangerous sword.
